sentences.english: Then a predetermining and surpassing the rigid displacements way is developed.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是小視場時剛體位移可達幾十個像素。

sentences.english: A generalized morpho interpolation method for nonrigid body motion is proposed based on morpho translation.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於形態變換的非剛體運動的廣義內插方法。

sentences.english: These work great for your environment geometry. They will not move if a Rigidbody collides with them.
sentences.chinese: 對於環境模型十分好用，當和剛體碰撞時而不會移動。

sentences.english: The covariant equation of plane motion body in curved space-time is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究彎曲時空中平面運動剛體的動力學協變方程。

sentences.english: The Parallel axis theorem of rigid body is verified with physical pendulum.
sentences.chinese: 利用復擺驗證了剛體的平行軸定理。

sentences.english: In this paper, attitude control problem of a rigid spacecraft with large angle maneuvers is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了剛體飛行器大角度機動的姿態控制問題。

sentences.english: This paper studied the nonlinear properties of a two stage isolation system with rigid limiters.
sentences.chinese: 研究了由多剛體組成的帶剛性限位的雙層隔振系統。

sentences.english: It compares the rigid limit equilibrium method with the finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 比較了有限元法和剛體極限平衡法的優缺點。

sentences.english: Vertical vibration of a rigid body on fluid saturated porous half space is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究圓柱形剛體在多孔飽和半空間上的垂直振動。

sentences.english: This peper presents a method for measuring rigid body motion by white light digital speckle photography.
sentences.chinese: 給出了一個測量物體剛體位移的數字白光散斑照相術。

sentences.english: The screw axis equation of the general motion of a rigid body has been derived by means of a comparison method.
sentences.chinese: 本文用比擬法推得了剛體一般運動的螺旋軸方程。

sentences.english: When the Rigidbody parent is moved around by forces, the child Colliders move along with it.
sentences.chinese: 當父級剛體受力移動時，子級碰撞器也隨之一起移動。

sentences.english: Constant Force is a quick utility for adding constant forces to a Rigidbody.
sentences.chinese: 恆力是一種快速有效地給剛體添加恆定外力的方法。

sentences.english: Cameras can be used in physics simulation if you add a Rigidbody Component.
sentences.chinese: 如果你添加一個剛體組件，相機可用於物理模擬。

sentences.english: The contiguous bodies of the system perform controlled relative motion.
sentences.chinese: 系統中各鄰接剛體之間作受控的相對運動。

sentences.english: But if a rigid body is in static equilibrium, it may not be in dynamic equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，靜平衡的剛體，不一定是動平衡的。

definition: just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
